articles.title: SII's meningitis vaccine gets WHO nod on quality, safety - Times of India

articles.author: Press Trust Of India
articles.title: Scientists discover traces of world's oldest glaciers in South Africa - Republic World
articles.description: Scientists have discovered the traces of the world's oldest known glaciers, dating from 2.9 billion years ago, in rocks sitting under the planet's largest gold deposits in South Africa.
articles.content:
Scientists have discovered the traces of the world's oldest known glaciers, dating from 2.9 billion years ago, in rocks sitting under the planet's largest gold deposits in South Africa.
